name: Lex Lehman
body: I have 11 Years of proven experience in the end-to-end software life cycle in both the telecommunications and defense industries. I have been Lead Engineer for multiple DOD exercises and experiments and have Secret Security Clearance. I am experienced in the production of CSS and (X)HTML for modern websites and have a reasonable grasp of using JavaScript frameworks, specifically jQuery.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
